plugin.name: sndfile
plugin.description: use libsndfile to read and write audio from and to files

element.name: sfsink
element.description: Write audio streams to disk using libsndfile
element.author: Andy Wingo <wingo at pobox dot com>

caps.name: sink
caps.details: audio/x-raw-float, rate=(int)[ 1, 2147483647 ], channels=(int)[ 1, 2147483647 ], endianness=(int)1234, width=(int)32; audio/x-raw-int, rate=(int)[ 1, 2147483647 ], channels=(int)[ 1, 2147483647 ], endianness=(int)1234, width=(int){ 16, 32 }, depth=(int){ 16, 32 }, signed=(boolean)true

element.name: sfsrc
element.description: Read audio streams from disk using libsndfile
element.author: Andy Wingo <wingo at pobox dot com>

caps.name: src
caps.details: audio/x-raw-float, rate=(int)[ 1, 2147483647 ], channels=(int)[ 1, 2147483647 ], endianness=(int)1234, width=(int)32; audio/x-raw-int, rate=(int)[ 1, 2147483647 ], channels=(int)[ 1, 2147483647 ], endianness=(int)1234, width=(int){ 16, 32 }, depth=(int){ 16, 32 }, signed=(boolean)true
